TopicTitle: Resouce Scanning Button Not Showing in Map Screen

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I have a probe scanning for minerals around Minmus. I've performed the survey and the antennae has beamed the results back to base but in the map screen there is no button on the right that allows you to cycle through the resources and concentrations.

Is anyone else getting that and knows how to fix it? I have all the USI packs installed as well as EPL.

Thanks.
Make sure you have the planet in focus (double click the planet)
